channel.title: My server wont show up in list
channel.description:
I have posted my server at the status list and it says: New server Great-Scape succesfully posted, however it will not show up on the list until it has been approved. Please allow at least 24 hours for the approval process. In order for it to be approved it must be online at the time it is checked again, if not online it will be deleted and you may post it again later. Click here to return to main page.
but it is online all the time but after a while i can re-post it again. This happends all the time and it seems like the database wont register it to the list or does it take 24 hours for it to show up in the list? please help me whit this annoying problem.
Thanks :)

item.title: My server wont show up in list
item.dc:creator: @urelind urelind
item.description:
@urelind wrote:

I added it now and it was posted it sad and i got no-ip DUC runing and the box is checked but if it dont showing up what do i do? And i have portforwarded allredy because i have been running rs server for really long now but this time people cant connect why?

Read full topic

item.title: My server wont show up in list
item.dc:creator: @urelind urelind
item.description:
@urelind wrote:

yeah but what i mean is in my run.cmd i got the following:
@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

i changed the Java version does that effect that people can connect to the server?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2009, 10:40:30 am[/size][hr]It did not show up after the update…

Read full topic
